jobInfo.Jobdescription:
D365 F& O Functional Support Consultant (OFFSHORE)

WITH SUPPLY CHAIN EXPERIENCE- (Finance and Operations, F & O Module)

START TIME 630 to 7 am Indian time

 

Opportunity for a D365 F&O Functional Support Consultant who will work across our D365 F&O, Commerce and Power Platforms. The role of the D365 Functional Consultant involves taking a people, process, and technology-based approach in order to address key business challenges for our D365 ecosystem. You’ll aim to improve business controls, complexity reduction and operational excellence, whilst being mindful of quality and efficiency to keep pace with change.

 

What you’ll do

•       Delivering functional design and build activities across our D365/Power Platform ecosystems alongside our IT partners and internal team members.

•       Configure and showcase Financial Management processes/systems as to how the solution meets our business requirements like Chart of Accounts, Consolidation of Accounts,

Financial Reporting, Foreign currency revaluation, Intercompany Accounting, Ledger Accruals and Allocations, Accounts Receivable and Accounts Payable, Fixed Assets, Cash and Bank Management, Project Accounting.

•       Working on ongoing support issues as first and/or second line support and managing end user expectations

•       Ongoing tweaks to configuration, enhancement/optimisation and customisation including integration and ongoing release/deployment documentation and training.

•       Working with the in-house technical consultant on version upgrades

•       Assisting the in-house technical consultant with the monthly releases, covering enhancements and bug fixes.

•       Working with Technical teams (Onshore/Offshore) with the monthly releases of features, enhancements, bug fixes and projects to support the business and its customers.

•       Preparing testing scenarios and unit testing detailed functional components for business solutions and producing prototypes to ensure business processes work effectively.

•       Preparing documents for process change, user stories and training guides

 

What you’ll bring

•       Technical Knowledge and detailed understanding of D365 F&O concepts, methodologies, ERP platforms.

•       Strong expertise knowledge & experience on Project Management & Accounting, Fixed Assets, AP/AR, General Ledger, Supply chain, Taxation and Audit.

•       Proven track record of successful D365 F&O SCM implementations, including full project lifecycle involvement.

•       Good expertise in finance and supply chain management concepts, processes, and best practices.

•       Current technical certifications in Dynamics 365 Finance and Operations

•       Agile delivery experience working closely with Product Owners and Subject Matter Experts to gather user stories and deliver features

•       Familiarity with Microsoft Power Automate (Flow), PowerApps & PowerBI
